header.title: Harmony of the 7 Bodies — Golden Seed
header.subtitle: A simple return to your axis, for when you forget you already carry the Light within.
header.body: This experience was designed for moments of disconnection, inner tiredness or discouragement. Instead of forcing motivation, it gently invites you to remember that your golden seed is still alive, even beneath the soil.

when_to_use.title: When to use this fragment
items: When you feel disconnected from yourself or from what you are doing.
When motivation seems gone, but you know you do not want to give up.
When your mind feels too heavy and you need a pause point.
Before sleep or upon waking, to align the day with a deeper intention.

what_you_live.title: What you experience here
what_you_live.body:
Instead of trying to “fix” you, this fragment reminds you that something in you is already in a growth process.
The harmonization of the seven bodies here is symbolic: light and sound create an environment where the physical body relaxes, the emotional field softens, the mind gains space and the subtle layer finds a bit more room to manifest — in its own time.

how_to_use.title: How to use it in practice
steps: Choose a minimally quiet place. Sit or lie down comfortably. Use headphones if you can.
Set a simple intention. Something like: “I allow myself to remember the Light I am”, or any sentence that feels true for you.
Press “Start Fragment” and simply follow along. Watch the light, listen to the sound and notice your body. There is no right or wrong, only experience.
At the end, take 3 deep breaths. Before rushing into the next thing, notice any small inner shift — even if subtle.

meta.recommendation: Daily use, especially in moments of disconnection

ui.tooltip_audio: Use headphones if possible and keep the volume at a comfortable level.
